name: Gravity Box (EyadTheDeveloper)
description:
There was an update an hour before the deadline to Fix a major bug, where quitting the game and rejoining would leave the player unable to move

You are a simple pentagon that mysteriously appeared in this physics breaking dungeon, you are tasked by an echoey voice to complete the dungeon, will you uncover the secrets of the gravity box?

The game features full control of the player's gravity, to follow the theme of the Geo Jam + slow mo for convenience

As mentioned before, this game was made in 1 week for the Geo jam, and follows the switch theme by giving the player the ability to control gravity

Controls:- WASD to switch gravity, Q for slow mo, and ESC to pause/leave end screens

The game is available as a browser game, and as an executable for Windows and MacOS (No guarantees that Mac will work)
